name: ts-stream-rpc
description: RPC framework over duplex streams with Protocol Buffer support
author: jibuji

scripts.generate:examples: npm run clean:examples && npm run generate:examples:proto && npm run generate:examples:service
scripts.generate:examples:proto:
mkdir -p src/examples/calculator/generated && pbjs -t static -w es6 --es6 -p src/examples/calculator/proto -o src/examples/calculator/generated/proto.js src/examples/calculator/proto/service.proto && pbts -o src/examples/calculator/generated/proto.d.ts src/examples/calculator/generated/proto.js && echo 'import $protobuf from "protobufjs/minimal";
' | cat - src/examples/calculator/generated/proto.js > temp && mv temp src/examples/calculator/generated/proto.js
scripts.start: npm run build:examples && node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/examples/calculator/basic.ts
scripts.test-client: npm run build:examples && node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/examples/calculator/ws-client.ts
scripts.test-libp2p: npm run build:examples && node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/examples/calculator/libp2p-client.ts
